entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
